item.title: Gnome Builder Beautifier
item.author: Author
item.description: Configuration of Beautifier plugins If you installed the gnome builder with Beautifier plugins (default). You will find it’s not support c++, since we have no config file for c++ language. Reference uncrusify: https://github.com/uncrustify/uncrustify full configration of uncrusify: http://uncrustify.sourceforge.net/config.txt
